titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to Lorcan Folan Papers RG.044
titlestmt.author: Collection processed by Mandy Abokhair and Aileen Thong

repository.corpname: Poly Archives at the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, NYU Libraries

did.physloc: Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology 5 MetroTech Center Brooklyn, New York, 11201 (646) 997-3943 polyarchives@nyu.edu

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Lorcan Folan was an Applied Physics Professor and Department Chair at the NYU Tandon School of Engineering. He received his Doctor of Philosophy in Physics from Polytechnic University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Lorcan Folan Papers; RG 044; box number; folder number or item identifier; Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Lorcan Folan Papers contain documents from 1973 to 2020. These documents were assembled by Folan throughout his time as Department Chair of the Physics Department. Most documents are of significance to multiple departments, including information on committees, financials, and more. Additionally, there are course catalogs, curriculum development plans, and documents on the NYU-Poly Merger. The collection is 3 linear feet, located on bay 29, shelves 6C and 7C.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is housed in six boxes and arranged into eight series:

Series I: Faculty Committees, 2004-2020 Series II: Polytechnic Financial Documents, 1986-2009 Series III: Nuclear, 2010 Series IV: Curriculum, 1992-2006 Series V: NYU-Poly Merger, 1973-2007 Series VI: Miscellaneous University Documents, 1989-2005 Series VII: Course Catalogs, 1990-2003 Series VIII: Accreditations, 1994-2013

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated to the Polytechnic Institute of New York University Archives by Lorcan Folan in 2020.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Polytechnic University in all its forms are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from the Poly Archives. Please contact the Poly Archives, polyarchives@nyu.edu, 646-997-3530.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Faculty Committees series of the Lorcan Folan Papers contains documents pertaining to the Undergraduate Curriculum and Standards Committee, the Graduate Curriculum and Standards Committee, the Federal Election Commission, and more.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Polytechnic Financial Documents series of the Lorcan Folan Papers contains financial documents about Polytechnic from 1986-2009.

did.unittitle: Physics Department Annual Reports and Maxwell Correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Nuclear series of the Lorcan Folan Papers contains information about nuclear waste disposal at Polytechnic University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Curriculum series of the Lorcan Folan Papers contains information about study abroad programs, graduate curriculum, and course information beyond the physics department.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The NYU-Poly Merger series of the Lorcan Folan Papers contains information about the potential and later fully realized merger of NYU and Polytechnic University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Miscellaneous University Documents series of the Lorcan Folan Papers contains information about various projects and events at Polytechnic University.

did.unittitle: Official Documents of Polytechnic University January 2005
Appreciative Inquiry Summit for Polytechnic University
Drawing a Picture of Our Future

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Course Catalogs series of the Lorcan Folan Papers includes course catalogs from each semester from 1990-2003.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Accreditations series of the Lorcan Folan Papers includes various documents about different university accrediations, including MSA and MSCHE, from 1994-2013.
